summary: A bright, white color scheme for gVim.
name: bclear
description:
A bright and relatively high-contrast GUI color scheme consisting of a white background and easy-to-read colors which are meant to be strong without being painfully vivid. Aside from undercurl and underline, all other attributes are removed (e.g. no bold or italic text). No language-specific highlighting is included: only the basics. 

Screenshot (Vim's highlight test): http://ompldr.org/vNXVkOQ
install_details: Copy bclear.vim to your colors directory of choice.

versions.release_notes: Added highlighting values for Conceal and ColorColumn
